extendedInfo.description: Klink is a utility by Faveset LLC for connecting a PC or Mac to your Android device over USB.  It focuses on simplicity and gets the job done with a few taps.  Yet, it is one of the fastest of its kind.  Power users also won't feel left out, as it has many mobile-specific settings that don't exist anywhere else.Installation is simple like with EasyTether or PdaNet, and the in-app setup guide walks you through everything in less than 10 minutes.The original version has over 20,000 paid users and an average Market rating above 4.3, so everything is well-tested, but please don't hesitate to email and ask questions!- Supports Windows (XP/Vista/7/32-bit/64-bit), Mac OS X 10.5 (or later), and Ubuntu (32-bit/64-bit)- This is only for USB connections to a PC or Mac.  Tablets are not supported!- Does not require a rooted device********PLEASE READ:This is a free demonstration version of the paid version of Klink that can be found in the market as "Klink - Tether".- This demo only allows access to a select number of websites and is meant to test compatibility and speed before buying the paid version.- The paid version is completely unrestricted: secure sites and such are never crippled after time.- When testing Klink at home, DISABLE any other active network connections.  (Turn off WiFi or unplug ethernet.)  You can use one or the other, but both cannot be active at the same time.********USAGE:After installing and running Klink, please tap "Set up your Computer" and follow the instructions.  Klink requires the installation of a small companion program on your PC or Mac, so following the step-by-step guide is suggested.HELP: Please visit the Google Group via http://www.faveset.com/klink/support, or email klink@faveset.com.It would be appreciated if you asked for help before posting negative feedback, as virtually all problems can be resolved.  Otherwise, please leave your email address when commenting so that someone can get in touch with you.PERMISSIONS:INTERNET - Requires a data connection.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - Used for downloading companion files during setup.

reviews.title: Awesome your app does better then you let on
reviews.comment: Dude you know this app does indeed work for tablet I tether my wifi internet to laptop...why because my wifi chip sucks cant even connect but with this I can get 3 bars 10mbs off my neighbor\'s wifi BUYING FULL VERSION TODAY!!! Omg I just did speakeasy speed test I get 8mps through usb spectacular my friend keep it up this is awesome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is what you want!
reviews.comment: Trust me, it works very well. And it is simple to use. I had some questions for the developer and he answered me promptly, and he really put effort in providing solutions for me. This is great stuff, and if you need a tether app, don\'t miss out on this one.
reviews.author: Eliezer Mishulovin

reviews.title: Definitely works!
reviews.comment: Works as stated in the description. Keep in mind that it\'s a demo version so you can\'t visit sites other than the provided ones. Can\'t wait to download the real deal!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: its good but
reviews.comment: Never understand why on my computer say I hey Internet conection but never let me surf anything.. I know i was doing something wrong but my mind say go away because u love your notebook, and better u try another apps .. than more easy to math... Nice job maybe next time don\'t make it so complicated.. have a nice day guys.. Thanks..!!
reviews.author: nikola Marino

reviews.title: Impressive
reviews.comment: I didn\'t think it would work but now I\'m really considering buying the full version.
reviews.author: Jay Kay

reviews.title: Tested with galaxy s
reviews.comment: Great app does what it says... Don\'t be hating for limited use on demo. It is there to test before you purchase and find out it doesn\'t work. Be happy for that. Recommendable. Getting full version shortly

reviews.comment: Ive been trying to get my computer to recognize my phone for 3 hours. Ive installed everything cant get it to work.

reviews.comment: Official work\'s for my galaxy note 2 (t-mobile jelly bean 4.1.2)

reviews.title: Awesome app and support
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this app for more than two years and have loved it. I just upgraded to a new phone and I had to talk to the vendor and they are very responsive and helpful. This has been the best app I have ever purchased.
reviews.author: Graushwein

reviews.title: IDK what\'s wrong
reviews.comment: I followed everything and yet my computer still doesn\'t recognize my device please make it compatible  Using: Virgin Mobile LG Optimus Elite

reviews.comment: Works perfectly on Debian testing, integration with NetworkManager and normal ifconfig device are great. Cheaper than similar EasyTether.

reviews.title: Seriously Impressive
reviews.comment: Internet on my PC thru this is faster than on my phone or thru the tethering means that my service provider encourages.
